sentences.sContent: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.sCn: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

sentences.sContent: ...While companies like Facebook harvest attention to generate revenue from advertisers...
...19 What does combining spending cuts with revenue mean...
...Companies have more to gain in the long run from driving up revenue than by driving down costs...
...Another risk: the new campus schedules might eventually produce less revenue for the institution and longer working hours for faculty members...
...where managers used financial incentives to motivate salesmen to meet specific revenue goals...

synos.tran: 税收，国家的收入；[会计]收益

phrases.pCn: 营业收入帐户；岁入帐；收益帐；进款帐

remMethod.val: re(回) ＋ ven(来) ＋ ue → 回来的东西 → 收入

trans.tranCn: 收入， 收益； 税收， 岁入
trans.tranOther: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services
